title: 高仿真原版黑洞[15w46a+]
author: -ZCH-
txt_content:
本帖最后由 -ZCH- 于 2015-12-26 20:50 编辑 

大家好，本人第二次次发工机巧艺

上次我在http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-501751-1-1.html看到了这么一句话

于是我就做了一个黑洞......版本:15w46a或以上

视频(密码:66666HH)看不了点我
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTQxMjIyMjg2MA==.html?from=y1.7-2
图片

(我也实在是拿不出别的图了)

指令来了!
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:stone,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:activator_rail,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"fill ~2 ~-3 ~-2 ~8 ~ ~2 stained_hardened_clay 0 hollow"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"fill ~2 ~-2 ~-2 ~8 ~-1 ~2 stained_glass 11 replace stained_hardened_clay"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~1 ~-2 ~ wall_sign 4 replace {Text1:"{\\"text\\":\\"黑洞\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\",\\"clickEvent\\":{\\"action\\":\\"run_command\\",\\"value\\":\\"/give @p spawn_egg 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:\\\\\\"Black Hole\\\\\\"},EntityTag:{id:Creeper}}\\"},\\"bold\\":true}",Text2:"{\\"text\\":\\"作者:ZCH\\",\\"color\\":\\"blue\\"}",Text3:"{\\"text\\":\\"右键获得黑洞\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\",\\"bold\\":true}",Text4:"{\\"text\\":\\"\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\"}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock air\\"}}",Text2:"{\\"text\\":\\"\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\"}",Text3:"{\\"text\\":\\"\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\"}",Text4:"{\\"text\\":\\"\\",\\"color\\":\\"black\\"}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"summon true"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1,Command:"/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=15,dy=-15,dz=15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~7 ~-2 ~-1 chain_command_block 3 replace {auto:1,Command:"/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=-15,dy=-15,dz=15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-2 ~-1 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand] blackhole 1 {CustomName:\\"Black Hole\\"}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~5 ~-2 ~-1 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=!ArmorStand,r=3] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~4 ~-2 ~-1 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1,Command:"/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=1,score_blackhole=1] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 end_gateway 0 outline {Age:1000}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~-1 repeating_command_block 5 replace {auto:1,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add blackhole dummy"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~ ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~-3 ~-1 ~ ~ ~ air}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=1]}]}]}]}复制代码
黑洞的功能:
1.吸人和吸生物
2.炸人和炸生物
3.直接秒杀靠得太近的人和生物

好了直接进入教程

指令在此！
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=1,score_blackhole=1] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 end_gateway 0 outline {Age:1000}
execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=!ArmorStand,r=3] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt
/scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand] blackhole 1 {CustomName:"Black Hole"}

/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=-15,dy=-15,dz=15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=15,dy=-15,dz=15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=15,dy=-15,dz=-15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=-15,dy=-15,dz=-15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true

/scoreboard players set @e[type=Creeper] blackhole 1 {CustomName:"Black Hole"}
/execute @e[type=Creeper,score_blackhole_min=1] ~ ~ ~ summon ArmorStand ~ ~10 ~ {Invulnerable:1,NoGravity:1b,DisabledSlots:2147483647,CustomName:"Black Hole"}
/kill @e[type=Creeper,score_blackhole_min=1]复制代码/scoreboard objectives add blackhole dummy复制代码添加一个叫blackhole(黑洞)的计分板

/scoreboard players set @e[type=Creeper] blackhole 1 {CustomName:"Black Hole"}复制代码先把名字叫Black Hole的苦力怕的blackhole的分数设为1，然后干掉它

/execute @e[type=Creeper,score_blackhole_min=1] ~ ~ ~ summon ArmorStand ~ ~10 ~ {Invulnerable:1,NoGravity:1b,DisabledSlots:2147483647,CustomName:"Black Hole"}/scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand] blackhole 1 {CustomName:"Black Hole"}复制代码在blackhole分数为1的苦力怕上面10格刷一个叫Black Hole的无敌的不可编辑的无重力的盔甲架并且不停地给它的blackhole分数加1

/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=1,score_blackhole=1] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 end_gateway 0 outline {Age:1000}复制代码在黑洞盔甲架那刷end gateway装饰
execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=!ArmorStand,r=3] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTn
复制代码在blackhole分数至少为40的黑洞盔甲架周围半径为3的除盔甲架以外的实体那刷TNT把它们直接炸飞呵呵
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=-15,dy=-15,dz=15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=15,dx=15,dy=-15,dz=15,type=!ArmorStand] levitation 1 1 true复制代码给旁边的人1秒的失重效果让他们往黑洞那里飘让哥带你装逼带你飞~~~
(上面的黑条上面都没写)
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=40] ~ ~ ~ entitydata @e[r=15,dx=15,dy=15,dz=15] {Motion:[-0.1,-0.1,-0.1]}复制代码修改周围实体的Motion属性让它们往黑洞那里飞
话说写这个数字花了我好久......看在我这么努力的份上就给我点人气和金粒吧~~~
/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,score_blackhole_min=1] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[r=3] @e[c=1]复制代码把盔甲架周围半径3格之内的实体tp到黑洞盔甲架那并干掉它们


at大法！
@林扬骐 @林扬骐 @林扬骐 @林扬骐 @林扬骐 


好了今天的教程就写到这里还不赶紧拿出你们的人气和金粒来砸死我啊！！！！！
赶快放到你的服务器去吸人吧！

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
你五次@都没有成功
这个想法有点类似于我计划中的龙卷风，可惜工机巧艺没选风

还是挺有意思的，不过我看了看居然没把传送用上（好吧如果这样盔甲架就走了）
不过Motion是对人无效的
还有你可以直接选择器里加name，空格部分试着加_吧

还是挺不错的作品，很装逼论实用性

希望更好的作品！
